About
ABOUT US
Shops at Boca Center offers an exclusive collection of upscale boutiques, fine and casual dining, popular nightlife and the Marriott Hotel all in the heart of Boca Raton.
Take a stroll through Shops at Boca Center today to explore our shops and grab a bite. Life is better in Boca!
Explore stores
Welcome to Shops at Boca Center - The Place to Be
Valet
When was Boca Center Built?
When was Boca Center Built?
Valet is available between 60 Vines and Copperfish Kitchen, open 7 days a week for dinner. In the fall valet will be available daily for lunch and dinner.
When was Boca Center Built?
When was Boca Center Built?
When was Boca Center Built?
Boca Center was developed by Thomas Crocker in 1987 and purchased by SITE Centers in 2022.
DOG FRIENDLY?
When was Boca Center Built?
DOG FRIENDLY?
Bring your furry friend for a day at Boca Center! Our Patios are open to man's best friend and some stores as well- see individual stores for more details.
PARKING
Whats New at Boca Center?
DOG FRIENDLY?
Boca Center has ample parking in the front of the shops as well as two perfectly situated parking decks in the back of the shopping center near the Marriott.
Whats New at Boca Center?
Whats New at Boca Center?
Whats New at Boca Center?
Something new is always around the corner at Shops at Boca Center. With new shops, dining and service opening annually.
Boca Live
Whats New at Boca Center?
Whats New at Boca Center?
To apply to be considered for a slot during our live music event in the fall, please email band links to
mblank@sitecenters.com
.
